meanings.definition: The optical property of a material in which a single ray of light splits into two rays with different speeds and directions.
meanings.sent1: The birefringence of the crystal caused the light to split into two rays.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study birefringence to understand how light behaves in different materials.
meanings.sent3: The birefringence of the glass made the light look like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a birefringence that captivated everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The birefringence of the diamond created a dazzling display of colors.

meanings.definition: The difference in refractive index between two perpendicular directions in a crystal.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler examined the birefringence of the crystal to determine its quality.
meanings.sent2: Minerals with high birefringence can display stunning optical effects.
meanings.sent3: The birefringence of the crystal made it seem like it had secret messages hidden inside.
meanings.sent4: The birefringence of the crystal revealed its inner beauty in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The birefringence of the crystal was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
